plmxml_bus:PLMXMLBusinessTypes.author: Teamcenter V14000.2.1.12_20230704.00 - infodba@IMC--1714896796(-1714896796)
plmxml_bus:PLMXMLBusinessTypes.languages: cs-cz de-de en-us es-es fr-fr it-it ja-jp ko-kr pl-pl pt-br ru-ru zh-cn zh-tw

plmxml_bus:QueryClause.stringValue: SELECT qid FROM E4MarketingReqRevision WHERE "release_status_list.name" = "${Releasestatus Name = }" AND "items_tag.item_id" = "${ITEMID = }" AND "e4Category" = "${e4Category = }" AND "e4Region" = "${e4Region = }" AND "e4RequirementDescription" = "${e4RequirementDescription = }" AND "e4Comment" = "${e4Comment = }" AND "e4RequirementCost" = "${e4RequirementCost = }" AND "e4Time" = "${e4Time = }" AND "e4GlobalGuidance" = "${e4GlobalGuidance = }" AND "e4MarketingClassification" = "${e4MarketingClassification = }" AND "e4RequirementStatus" = "${e4RequirementStatus = }" AND "e4MarketingLOB" = "${e4MarketingLOB = }" AND "e4Disclaimer" = "${e4Disclaimer = }" AND "e4Brand" = "${e4Brand = }"
